text.0: thy blessed majesty victorious agni shines brightly in the neighbourhood of sūrya.
text.1: splendid to see it shows even at nighttime and food is fair to look on in thy beauty.
text.2: agni disclose his thought for him who singeth the well strong god while thou art praised with fervour.
text.3: vouchsafe to us that powerful hymn o mighty which radiant one with all the gods thou lovest.
text.4: from thee o agni springs poetic wisdom from thee come thoughts and hymns of praise that prosper.
text.5: from thee flows wealth with heroes to adorn it to the truehearted man who gives oblation.
text.6: from thee the hero springs who wins the booty bringer of help mighty of real courage.
text.7: from thee comes wealth sent by the gods blissgiving agni from thee the fleet impetuous charger.
text.8: immortal agni thee whose voice is pleasant as first in rank as god religious mortals.
text.9: invite with hymns thee who removest hatred friend of the home the households lord unerring.
text.10: far from us thou removest want and sorrow far from us all illwill when thou protectest.
text.11: son of strength agni blest is he at evening whom thou as god attendest for his welfare.
